participant_1.background:
I prefer comfortable, practical clothing that won't get in the way of my work.
My worst nightmare is being fired from my internship.
I enjoy photography, especially of my cats and rainy scenes.
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
I dance to K-pop music to express myself.

participant_2.background:
My music is my escape.
i get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.
i like to write poetry in my spare time.
i will study computer science.
I celebrated my birthday by going on a horseback riding trip.

content.text: What are you up to today?
Just got back from a nice horseback ride on my birthday.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What a great way to celebrate!
Yeah, it was really nice. I love getting out and doing things that are a bit different.
I totally agree. What other kind of things do you like to do?
I enjoy writing poetry and playing music.
Wow! That's so cool. I love to write poetry too! What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and sing. I mostly play folk music, but I also like to play some rock and roll.
That's awesome! I play the piano and I love to sing as well.
That's really cool! We should collaborate on a song sometime.
That would be really fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! We can exchange contact information and figure out a time to work together
